metadata.title: 5519-1 -- Python vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Python incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5519-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3.9-venv - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 python3.9-doc - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 python3.9-minimal - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 python3.9-full - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 libpython3.9-dev - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 idle-python3.9 - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 libpython3.9-testsuite - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 python3.9 - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 python3.9-dev - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 python3.9-examples - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 libpython3.9-minimal - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 libpython3.9 - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 libpython3.9-stdlib - 3.9.7-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required  python2.7-doc - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 python2.7-examples - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 libpython2.7-stdlib - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 libpython2.7-minimal - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 libpython2.7 - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 libpython2.7-testsuite - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 python2.7 - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 idle-python2.7 - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 python2.7-dev - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 libpython2.7-dev - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 python2.7-minimal - 2.7.18-8ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
